examples.example: 我准备在休假期间好好放松一下，去看看外面的世界。

translate.english: I am going to relax well during the vacation and go to see the outside world.

examples.example: 休假时我会和家人一起去海边度假，享受美好的时光。

translate.english: When on vacation, I will go to the seaside for a vacation with my family and enjoy the wonderful time.
